resources.string: Ungrouped notification go here by default
Shows the TTS for the current novel/chapter
Shows the backup and restore progress
Your One Stop For All Novels
Loading might take time, depending on the number of chapters
Clears the cache, files and database
Novel will be removed from the library while also deleting all its chapters
Thanks for all the work. I would like to see this in the next version and here is my donation.
Hidden buttons to unlock the content. Good Luck finding them!!

"Novel Library is an application for providing search results aggregation services for " "novel readers. All contents on Novel Library are shared by readers or automatically " "searched and collated from the Internet by the program. Novel Library does not produce any content. 

"
"Copyright of all contents on Novel Library application belongs to both the author and " "the publisher. If you have any questions about the copyright of the content, please contact " "us and we will contact you for the first time and withdraw the content. 

"
"All Contents on the Novel Library Application represent the views of the author personally, " "and do not represent the position of the application. We do not bear legal responsibility. " "If you find any content violated the law, please report to us and we will review it. 

"
"contact: gmathi.developer@gmail.com
"
"Donations would help speed up the releases with new features. " "You can send your donate using the GMail application to gmathi.developer@gmail.com "
Press Back again to exit Novel Library
Experimental: Downloads really fast but your device may lag/freeze while downloading.
If turned off "Search" will be main screen instead.
Some websites redirect to ads in when javascript is enabled
I am happy that you want to donate! For now, please spread the word and share the app with fellow novel lovers!
Novel needs to be added to library, before chapters can be downloaded individually!
Manage novel downloads using download manager. Download all chapters?
Novel downloads can be managed by navigating to "Downloads" through the navigation drawer menu
Manage novel downloads using download manager. Download all new chapters released?
%1$d novels with a total of %2$d new chapters. Click to start reading!
The novel needs to be added to Library before you can download/mark individual chapters. Do you want to add this novel - %s to the Library?
Looks like you haven\'t read \'%s\' yet, why don\'t you start now?
Shows the vertical scrollbar on the right edge of the screen to track your progress of the chapter
Shows the chapter\'s comments section in the reader mode. (Limited Websites Supported)
Use Volume button to scroll up/down while reading
Keeps the screen on while you are reading
Updated for the novels in your library
Downloads for the novels in your library
Do you want to remove the novel from downloads?
Reader mode will be on permanently
Hide the system bars when reading
Merge All Links To Single Page
Merges all the web pages in to a single web page, so that the announcement posts are shown in the same screen
"Next Chapter" & "Previous Chapter" Links will be shown on the reader mode screen
The reader mode menu icon will be hidden, if this is enabled. You can also open reader mode menu by swiping from the far right edge of the screen
Please wait 5~15 secs while we check for CloudFlare…
Backup & Restore data to a ZIP archive
Clears the cache, files and database (including the Auto-generated folders)
Backup the data into a ZIP archive
Restore data from a ZIP archive
You need to restart the app, after you toggle this!
Enables the hourly notifications when new chapter updates are available
Novel Section will be removed and all the novels will be moved to currently reading
Enter the name for new Novel Section:
Novel Section name cannot be a existing one or empty
Simple Text - Novel & Novel Sections Backup
TTS Service is not active.\nStart the TTS playback trough the chapter view first!
Change the distance to scroll when using volume keys
This project is an open-source project being developed with love for the novel reading community. If you would like to help out you can get in touch with us in discord!
Please use discord to report a bug.%1$s
Choose a convenient location to save the backup ZIP file in
Navigate to the location where your backup ZIP is and select it
Not enough space left on the device! Please make enough space - %1$s and try again!
Couldn\'t find the backup file. Please choose a new destination
Simple Text - Novel & Novel Sections Restore
Show Navigation Bar At Chapter End
Shows the navigation bar when reached the page end for phones without hardware navbar. Works only when Show Full Screen is on
Retains inlined text color styles on elements
Inverts brightness on text colors to fit in more with dark theme of reader mode. Applies only when dark theme is enabled
Enforces images maximum width to screen width. Avoids horizontal scroll appearing due to wide images
This Novel is most likely copyrighted or pay-walled and that is the reason you don\'t see any chapters!!
Change the Background and Text colors of both day and night mode
Enable scrolling text on novel titles and other items where text is too large to fit on the screen
This novel was officially licensed by %1$s and may have missing (by DMCA or voluntary), or paywalled, chapters
Delete login cookies and log out from the sync source?
Add all novels and sections from the app to the list on the source website?
Synchronize novels from this source to the lists on the source website.
Open browser to log in to the source website. Don\'t forget to hit the "Remember Me" checkbox!
Novels added through app will be added to your list on the source website.
Novels removed through app will be removed from your list on the source website.
Reading chapters in the app will synchronize reading bookmark on the source website.
Add novels and sections from the app to your lists on the source website.
Delete the Login cookies from the device.

The sync feature lets you synchronize your app library with the source website. Please keep in mind that this feature is experimental and currently only supports syncing from the app to the source website but not the other way around.
Advanced usage: Add your own selector query for unsupported websites in reader mode, enabling their support. (Refer JSOUP documentation for help)
Please update the WebView app for better compatibility
Instead of showing the number of new chapters, show the chapters remaining based on the last chapter read. The badge being red will still mean that there\'s a new chapter.
Select which DNS provider to use for network requests.
This error is due to cloudflare. Try NovelSync in Settings.\nIf that doesn\'t help, try a VPN connection.\nJoin discord, if you need any assistance.

This extension was signed with an untrusted certificate and wasn't activated.

A malicious extension could read any login credentials stored in NovelLibrary or execute arbitrary code.

By trusting this certificate you accept these risks.
This extension is no longer available.
This extension is not from the official NovelLibrary extensions list.
Do you want to remove selected novels from your library?
Do you want to hard reset selected novels?
Change the scroll length, auto scroll - on/off & interval, volume button to scroll options.
Automatically scrolls the reader view based on the scroll distance and the interval set below
Change the distance to scroll when using auto scroll is enabled
Change the interval in seconds for which the scroll happens
Merge All Links To Single Page
Merges all the web pages in to a single web page, so that Read Aloud won\'t miss chapters behind announcement pages
Set the Read Aloud synthesis pitch offset
Set the Read Aloud synthesis speech rate
Add extra text processing filters to Read Aloud
Download new versions of processing filters and update the cache.
You need an active internet connection to update the filter cache!
Automatically read the next chapter when the current chapter finishes in Read Aloud mode
After Read Aloud finish the chapter it would mark it as read
When Read Aloud starts reading the chapter it would move the bookmark to that chapter
Select the language text to speech engine should talk with
Do not read out the chapter title (when possible)
Play a short sound effect when changing the chapters
Only works with link merging: Completely ignore content of the initial page if it contains buffer links. (For chapters behind "click here for actual chapter")
Only read the page with most text
Only works with link merging: When loading linked pages, only use the one that has the most text in it. Doesn\'t discard original page.
EXPERIMENTAL! Lowers the pitch of the dialogue sentences. Not guaranteed to work.
Use the legacy variant of the TTS player. Feature set of 0.22.1, no guarantees of new features working (needs TTS restart!).
Prevent the screen from dimming when TTS controls are open.
How many sentences to rewind when the rewind button is pressed.
How many sentences to jump forward when pressing the forward button is pressed.
Swap the behavior of rewind/skip buttons on remote controller (does not affect app UI, affects notification).
Jump to previous/next chapter when pressing rewind/forward while on first/last sentences.
Whether to stop playback or try to load next chapter when chapter fails to load.
Use TTS to announce when last chapter has finished reading and no more chapters can be read.
Convert text URL to clickable links
Converts obvious urls (i.e. starting with http) to clickable links
Download chapters using API instead of Doc for NU
